message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you meet me at that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $82. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value of this product at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Can you consider that price?

I understand that you're still looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $79. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great value for you.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking we agreed on $75. Can you meet me at that price?
